messages.message:
<!channel> Hi Folks, I have mentioned this a few times now: while we build out the auto-hibernating capability, please hibernate your sandbox, if you are not using them.  The following EPD sandboxes were not hibernated:
• federal-translation
• flow-compression
• pdfsvc-solutiontests
• debug002
We have to work together to keep our cloud costs down.  And, it should not fall on policing by a few folks to keep this under check.
@shaunak we (EPD & sales eng) are working on demo development for our customer this weekend (federal-translation sandbox)
:thumbsup_all: please revive it back when you are planning to use it: https://jenkins.instabase.com/view/Sandboxes/job/sandbox-hibernate-revive/build?delay=0sec
